document_data.name: Dragonviper's Anchor
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dragonviper's Anchor''' was an [[inn]] located in the city of [[Urmlaspyr]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Description: A large anchor that was once equipped on the ''[[Dragonviper]]'' ship dominated the front foyer. The inn appeared old and worn out.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Olem Surtrar]], who was once the captain of the ''Dragonviper'', owned and operated the inn.
document_data.Activities: The Dragonviper's Anchor was quite comfortable despite its aged appearance.
